name: warmup0.exe
description:
Hey, it's Charles.

I made this game in a total of 3 hours by myself.

I've managed to put together a team to help make better games than this. Joshua Deitrich and Joshua Pozsonyi are my sound designer and storyteller.

As you may have noticed, those 2 things are things that I really need.

Nevertheless, here's a simple arcade game. If you want, you can tip us so that we can make better games for the future, as well as release them on Google Play and different platforms, like HTML or iOS.

contact charlesxiv944@gmail.com to talk to me.

WAIT! YOU CAN DOWNLOAD THIS GAME FOR FREE.

Just press "No thanks, just take me to downloads."
